comments.raw_text:
From https://wiki.mozilla.org/Blocklisting/Blocked_Graphics_Drivers:
  We require NVIDIA driver version 257.21 or newer

We also blocklist <= 258.96 on device 0a6c for precisely this reason.

Brian, is this the latest Lenovo-provided driver? We should probably blocklist this, but I'd like to know if there's a newer version that we can recommend as an alternative.
